summary: This document is a Declaration of Condominium for The Ratcliffe, a property located in Charlotte, North Carolina. It outlines the establishment of the condominium, the rights and responsibilities of the owners' association, and the management of common areas and facilities. This document outlines the Reciprocal Operating Agreement (ROA) and the Declaration for The Ratcliffe Condominium in Mecklenburg County, North Carolina. It details the rights, responsibilities, and restrictions for owners and the management of the condominium, including provisions for maintenance, assessments, and the use of common elements.

The declaration includes provisions for common elements and expenses related to the condominium.
The document outlines the rights and responsibilities of unit owners and the association.
The Ratcliffe Condominium is governed by a Reciprocal Operating Agreement (ROA).
